description: This is the source code for the HomeScreen widget in a Flutter application. It constructs a UI screen featuring a vintage-themed background, a search bar, discover banner, and a horizontal list of trending books, utilizing various custom widgets and mock data.

classes.name: HomeScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget representing the main home screen with a vintage aesthetic, search, discover section, and trending books list.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI of the HomeScreen, assembling various widgets into a scrollable list with sections for discover and trending books.
